title: Bug 122584 - Cascading parameter values not displayed properly in HTML viewer
description: Description: Cascading parameter values can't be displayed properly in the HTML viewer.
OB: When selecting the first parameter value, the second parameter value in the same cascading parameter group is not displayed in the HTML viewer.
EB: Expect that when selecting the first parameter value, the corresponding second parameter value in the same cascading parameter group should be displayed in the HTML viewer.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the HTML viewer.
2. Select the first parameter value in the cascading parameter group.
